title: The Work of Kew gardens
creator_credit: Helen Wiggins Films and A.E.C. Hopkins
brief_description: Documentary of all the collections of plants both living dead, the various research divisions and library (some of the matter is 500 years old). Special classrooms for diploma student gardeners, International research Department.
